name: Bay20 Software Consultancy Services P L
description:
Bay20 Software is an ISO certified and NASSCOM member e-commerce solution provider. We follow agile by heart and take pride in every piece of work we produce for our clients.
We are official partners of hosted platforms like Shopware, Bigcommerce and shopify.
 
We specialize in e-Commerce projects from Design, development, deployment, maintenance and marketing. We provide complete consulting on e-Commerce/web/mobile assignments on platforms like Magento, Shopware, Prestashop, BigCommerce, Woocommerce, shopify, slaesforce, codeigniter, laravel, symphony, express, React Native etc.
We are a team of experienced and passionate eCommerce, Web and mobile app design, development and promotion experts. The team has diversity in terms of skill-set. This diversity in skills make us perfect team to deal with all kind of projects.
